scenarios.name: Control Panel Classes Add completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Control Panel Classes Add operations
scenarios.when: a valid Control Panel Classes Add request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Control Panel Classes Add handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Control Panel Classes Add operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Control Panel Classes Add records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Control Panel Classes Add
scenarios.when: the operation completes (success or failure)
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
